front.title: Management Information Base for IP Version 6: UDP and TCP Groups

abstract.t: This document is one in the series of documents that define various MIB object groups for IPv6. Specifically, the UDP and TCP groups are defined in this document. This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the IPv6-based internets. This document specifies a MIB module in a manner that is both compliant to the SNMPv2 SMI, and semantically identical to the peer SNMPv1 definitions.
